cause.description:
Local "I Have a Dream" Projects adopt an entire same-grade from an elementary school or an entire age group from a public housing development. They work with this group of children (the "Dreamers") and their families year-round from their elementary school years through college by providing a long-term program of mentoring, tutoring, and enrichment and tuition assistance for higher education.
1. Opportunity to change children's lives.
cause.mission: To motivate and empower children from low-income communities to reach their education and career goals.
cause.name: I Have A Dream-Detroit
